columns_description.language: detected language of the document, as ISO 639-1 language code
columns_description.sentimentValue: detected sentiment of the document, from an interval _\[-1.0; 1.0\]_
columns_description.sentimentPolarity: detected sentiment of the document (_-1_, _0_ or _1_)
columns_description.sentimentLabel: sentiment of the document as a label (_negative_, _neutral_ or _positive_)
columns_description.usedChars: the number of characters used by this document
